name: COMMONWEALTLH of Pennsylvania, ex rel. Derrald HANDY AS-2003, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Pennsylvania BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Commonwealtlh ex rel. Handy v. Commonwealth

parties: COMMONWEALTLH of Pennsylvania, ex rel. Derrald HANDY AS-2003, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Pennsylvania BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 7th day of February, 2013, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Prohibition is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
61 A.3d 193
COMMONWEALTLH of Pennsylvania, ex rel. Derrald HANDY AS-2003, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Pennsylvania BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Respondent.
No. 210 EM 2012.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 7, 2013.
